ca.mcgill.ecse223.quoridor.model

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Quoridor

    public interface Controller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean initializeNewGame(User user1, User user2)
      This method takes two users to initialize a new game for them.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeNewGame

        boolean initializeNewGame(User user1,
                          User user2)
        This method takes two users to initialize a new game for them. It will return a boolean value to indicate if a new game is successfully initialized.
        Parameters:
        user1 - The first user who will join in the game
        user2 - The second user who will join in the game
        Returns:
        A boolean value to indicate if a new game is initialized successfully
